admin:locale.subtitle: Postavite mogućnosti lokalizacije za svoj wiki
admin:locale.base.hint: Svi elementi teksta UI bit će prikazani na odabranom jeziku.
admin:locale.autoUpdate.label: Ažuriraj automatski
admin:locale.autoUpdate.hintWithNS: Automatski preuzmite ažuriranja za sve omogućene dolje navedene jezike.
admin:locale.namespaces.label: Višejezični Namespaces
admin:locale.namespaces.hint: Omogućuje više jezičnih verzija iste stranice.
admin:locale.activeNamespaces.label: Aktivni Namespaces
admin:locale.activeNamespaces.hint: Popis lokala omogućen za višejezične prorede imena. Označeni osnovni lokal uvijek će biti uključen bez obzira na ovaj izbor.
admin:locale.namespacingPrefixWarning.ti: Lokalni kôd bit će prefiks za sve url-ove. (e.g. /{{langCode}}/page-name)
admin:locale.namespacingPrefixWarning.su: URL-ovi bez lokalnog koda automatski će se preusmjeriti na gore definirani osnovni lokal.
admin:locale.base.label: Jezik stranice
admin:locale.autoUpdate.hint: Automatski preuzmite ažuriranja na ovaj lokalitet kada postanu dostupna.
admin:system.subtitle: Informacije o vašem sustavu
admin:contribute.subtitle: Pomoć u podršci razvoju i operacijama Wiki.js
admin:contribute.talkToFriends: Razgovarajte s prijateljima i kolegama o tome kako je fenomenalan Wiki.js!
admin:contribute.submitAnIdea: Pošaljite ideju ili glasujte o predloženom prijedlogu na {{0}}.
admin:contribute.foundABug: Pronašli ste grešku? Pošaljite problem na {{0}}.
admin:contribute.helpTranslate: Pomozite prevesti Wiki.js na svoj jezik. Javite nam na {{0}}.
admin:contribute.openCollective: Wiki.js je također dio inicijative Otvoreni kolektiv, transparentnog fonda koji ide prema resursima zajednice. Možete financijski pridonijeti davanjem mjesečne ili jednokratne donacije:
admin:contribute.needYourHelp: Trebamo vašu pomoć da nastavimo poboljšavati softver i pokrećemo razne povezane usluge (npr. Hosting i umrežavanje).
admin:contribute.openSource: Wiki.js je besplatni i open-source softver koji vam je donio {{0}} do {{1}} i {{2}}.
editor:save.error: Došlo je do pogreške prilikom izrade stranice
admin:contribute.tshirts: Također možete kupiti majice Wiki.js za financijsku potporu projektu:
common:newpage.title: Ova stranica još ne postoji.
common:newpage.subtitle: Želite li sad izraditi stranicu?

admin:navigation.title: Navigacija

admin:navigation.noSelectionText: Izaberite stavku za navigaciju na lijevoj strani.
admin:navigation.noItemsText: Kliknite gumb Dodaj kako biste dodali svoju prvu navigacijsku stavku.
auth:fields.name: Ime
auth:registerSubTitle: Ispunite obrazac u nastavku kako biste stvorili svoj račun.
auth:forgotPasswordSubtitle: Unesite svoju adresu e-pošte da biste dobili upute za resetiranje zaporke:
admin:mail.title: Pošta
admin:mail.subtitle: Konfigurirajte postavke e-pošte
auth:registerCheckEmail: Provjerite e-poštu kako biste aktivirali svoj račun.
common:unauthorized.title: Neovlašten
common:notfound.title: Nije pronađeno
common:notfound.subtitle: Stranica ne postoji.
admin:contribute.patreon: Postanite potpora ili sponzor putem Patreona (izravno ide u podršku vodećem programeru Nicolasu Giardu u cilju punog radnog vremena na Wiki.js)
common:welcome.title: Dobrodošli na svoj wiki!
common:welcome.subtitle: Započnimo i stvorimo početnu stranicu.
admin:dev.flags.title: Zastavice
admin:dev.graphiql.title: GraphiQL
admin:dev.voyager.title: Voyager
admin:contribute.paypal: Jednokratno ili ponavljajuće donacije izvršite putem Paypala:
admin:locale.sideloadHelp: Ako niste povezani s internetom ili ne možete preuzeti lokalne datoteke koristeći gornju metodu, pakete možete ručno učitati ručno prenoseći ih u nastavku.
admin:webhooks.title: Webhooks
admin:webhooks.subtitle: Upravljanje s webhooks-ima vanjskim servisima
admin:mail.smtpTLSHint: Treba biti omogućeno kad koristite port 465, u protivnom isključen (587 ili 25).
admin:mail.dkimHint: DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) pruža sloj sigurnosti za sve poruke e-pošte poslane s Wiki.js pružajući način na koji će primatelji potvrditi naziv domene i osigurati autentičnost poruke.
admin:mail.dkimPrivateKeyHint: Privatni ključ za selektor u PEM formatu
admin:mail.testHint: Pošaljite testnu e-poštu kako biste osigurali da vaša SMTP konfiguracija radi.
admin:system.dbPartialSupport: Verzija baze podataka nije u potpunosti podržana. Neke će funkcije možda biti ograničene ili neće raditi kako se očekuje.
admin:auth.subtitle: Konfigurirajte postavke provjere autentičnosti vašeg wikija
admin:auth.jwtAudienceHint: URN publike koji se koristi u JWT-u izdan je nakon prijave. Obično vaše ime domene. (npr. urn: your.domain.com)
admin:auth.tokenExpirationHint: Rok trajanja tokena dok ga ne treba obnoviti. (zadano: 30m)
admin:auth.tokenRenewalPeriodHint: Maksimalno razdoblje tokena može se obnoviti po isteku. (zadano: 14 dana)
admin:theme.subtitle: Izmijenite izgled i doživljaj wikija
admin:theme.siteThemeHint: Teme utječu na prikazivanje stranica sa sadržajem. Ostali odjeljci web stranice (poput uređivača ili administratorskog područja) ne utječu.
admin:theme.darkModeHint: Ne preporučuje se zbog pristupačnosti. Možda nisu podržane sve teme.
admin:theme.cssOverrideHint: CSS kôd koji treba ubrizgati nakon zadanog CSS-a sustava. Razmislite o upotrebi prilagođenih tema ako imate veliku količinu css koda. Ubrizgavanje previše CSS koda rezultirat će lošim performansama učitavanja stranice! CSS će se automatski umanjiti.
admin:theme.headHtmlInjectionHint: HTML kôd treba ubrizgati neposredno prije završne oznake zaglavlja. Obično iza oznake script.
admin:theme.bodyHtmlInjectionHint: HTML kôd koji treba ubrizgati neposredno prije završne oznake tijela.
admin:auth.strategyNoConfiguration: Ova strategija nema mogućnosti konfiguracije koje možete izmijeniti.
admin:auth.selfRegistrationHint: Dopustite bilo kojem korisniku koji je strategija uspješno ovlastila da pristupi wikiju.
admin:auth.domainsWhitelist: Ograničite se na određene domene e-pošte
admin:auth.domainsWhitelistHint: Popis domena ovlaštenih za registraciju. Domena korisničke adrese e-pošte mora odgovarati jednoj od njih kako bi se dobio pristup.
admin:auth.autoEnrollGroupsHint: Automatski dodijeli nove korisnike tim grupama.
admin:auth.force2fa: Prisilite sve korisnike na dvofaktorsku provjeru autentičnosti (2FA)
admin:auth.force2faHint: Korisnici će morati postaviti 2FA prilikom prve prijave i korisnik ih ne može onemogućiti.
admin:auth.configReferenceSubtitle: Neke strategije mogu zahtijevati da se postave neke konfiguracijske vrijednosti na vašem davatelju. Oni su dati samo u referentne svrhe i možda ih neće trebati trenutna strategija.
admin:auth.siteUrlNotSetup: Prvo morate postaviti važeće {{siteUrl}}! Kliknite {{general}} na lijevoj bočnoj traci.
admin:auth.callbackUrl: URL Povratnog poziva / URI za preusmjeravanje
admin:storage.subtitle: Postavljanje ciljeva sigurnosne kopije i sinkronizacije vašeg sadržaja
admin:storage.noConfigOption: Ovaj cilj pohrane nema mogućnosti konfiguracije koje možete izmijeniti.
admin:storage.syncDirectionSubtitle: Odaberite kako se sinkronizacija sadržaja vodi za ovaj cilj pohrane.
admin:storage.syncDirBiHint: In bi-directional mode, content is first pulled from the storage target. Any newer content overwrites local content. New content since last sync is then pushed to the storage target, overwriting any content on target if present.
admin:storage.syncDirPushHint: Content is always pushed to the storage target, overwriting any existing content. This is safest choice for backup scenarios.
admin:storage.syncDirPullHint: Content is always pulled from the storage target, overwriting any local content which already exists. This choice is usually reserved for single-use content import. Caution with this option as any local content will always be overwritten!
admin:storage.syncScheduleHint: For performance reasons, this storage target synchronize changes on an interval-based schedule, instead of on every change. Define at which interval should the synchronization occur.
admin:search.subtitle: Configure the search capabilities of your wiki
admin:search.engineNoConfig: This engine has no configuration options you can modify.
admin:search.listRefreshSuccess: List of search engines has been refreshed.
admin:dashboard.versionLatest: You are running the latest version.
admin:dashboard.contributeSubtitle: Wiki.js is a free and open source project. There are several ways you can contribute to the project.
admin:auth.refreshSuccess: List of strategies has been refreshed.
admin:general.siteUrlHint: Full URL to your wiki, without the trailing slash. (e.g. https://wiki.example.com)
admin:general.siteTitleHint: Displayed in the top bar and appended to all pages meta title.
admin:general.uploadSizeHint: An image of {{size}} pixels is recommended for best results.
admin:general.companyNameHint: Name to use when displaying copyright notice in the footer. Leave empty to hide.
admin:general.siteDescriptionHint: Default description when none is provided for a page.
admin:general.metaRobotsHint: Default: Index, Follow. Can also be set on a per-page basis.
common:header.searchHint: Type at least 2 characters to start searching...
common:page.deleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete page {{title}}?
common:page.deleteSubtitle: The page can be restored from the administration area.
editor:props.title: Title
editor:props.pathHint: Do not include any leading or trailing slashes.
editor:props.tagsHint: Use tags to categorize your pages and make them easier to find.
editor:props.publishToggleHint: Unpublished pages can still be seen by users having write permissions on this page.
editor:props.publishStartHint: Leave empty for no start date
editor:props.publishEndHint: Leave empty for no end date
editor:unsaved.title: Discard Unsaved Changes?
editor:unsaved.body: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave the editor and discard any modifications you made since the last save?
editor:select.title: Which editor do you want to use for this page?
editor:select.cannotChange: This cannot be changed once the page is created.
editor:assets.title: Assets
editor:assets.renameAssetSubtitle: Enter the new name for this asset:
editor:assets.deleteAssetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete asset
editor:assets.noUploadError: You must choose a file to upload first!
editor:markup.heading: Heading {{level}}

admin:analytics.providerNoConfiguration: This provider has no configuration options you can modify.

admin:theme.iconsetHint: Set of icons to use for the sidebar navigation.
common:outdatedBrowserWarning: Your browser is outdated. Upgrade to a {{modernBrowser}}.
admin:theme.cssOverrideWarning: {{caution}} When adding styles for page content, you must scope them to the {{cssClass}} class. Omitting this could break the layout of the editor!
admin:users.noGroupAssigned: This user is not assigned to any group yet. You must assign at least 1 group to a user.
admin:users.userAlreadyAssignedToGroup: User is already assigned to this group!
admin:storage.actionsInactiveWarn: You must enable this storage target and apply changes before you can run actions.
auth:changePwd.subtitle: Choose a new password
auth:changePwd.instructions: You must choose a new password:
editor:props.allowCommentsHint: Enable commenting abilities on this page.
editor:props.displaySharingBarHint: Show a toolbar with buttons to share and print this page
editor:props.displayAuthorHint: Show the page author along with the last edition time.
editor:props.allowRatingsHint: Enable rating capabilities on this page.
tags:selectOneMoreTagsHint: Select one or more tags on the left.
tags:noResults: Couldn t find any page with the selected tags.
tags:noResultsWithFilter: Couldn t find any page matching the current filtering options.

admin:contribute.github: Become a sponsor via GitHub Sponsors (goes directly into supporting lead developer Nicolas Giard s goal of working full-time on Wiki.js)
admin:tags.title: Tags
admin:ssl.title: SSL
admin:ssl.subtitle: Manage SSL configuration
admin:ssl.providerHint: Select Custom Certificate if you have your own certificate already.
admin:ssl.domainHint: Enter the fully qualified domain pointing to your wiki. (e.g. wiki.example.com)
admin:ssl.httpPortHint: Non-SSL port the server will listen to for HTTP requests. Usually 80 or 3000.
admin:ssl.httpsPortHint: SSL port the server will listen to for HTTPS requests. Usually 443.
admin:ssl.httpPortRedirectHint: Will automatically redirect any requests on the HTTP port to HTTPS.
admin:ssl.writableConfigFileWarning: Note that your config file must be writable in order to persist ports configuration.
admin:general.logoUrlHint: Specify an image to use as the logo. SVG, PNG, JPG are supported, in a square ratio, 34x34 pixels or larger. Click the button on the right to upload a new image.
admin:users.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete user {{username}}?
admin:users.groupAssignNotice: Note that you cannot assign users to the Administrators or Guests groups from this panel.
admin:users.deleteConfirmForeignNotice: Note that you cannot delete a user that already created content. You must instead either deactivate the user or delete all content that was created by that user.
editor:props.jsHint: Note that scripts will not work if your administrator disabled this feature.
editor:props.cssHint: CSS will automatically be minified upon saving.
admin:navigation.modeSiteTree.title: Site Tree
admin:navigation.modeCustom.title: Custom Navigation
admin:navigation.modeCustom.description: Static Navigation Menu + Site Tree Button
admin:navigation.modeNone.title: None
admin:tags.subtitle: Manage page tags
admin:tags.label: Label
admin:tags.noSelectionText: Select a tag from the list on the left.
admin:tags.noItemsText: Add a tag to a page to get started.
admin:tags.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete tag {{tag}}? The tag will also be unlinked from all pages.
admin:api.subtitle: Manage keys to access the API
admin:api.noKeyInfo: No API keys have been generated yet.
admin:api.revokeConfirmText: Are you sure you want to revoke key {name}? This action cannot be undone!
admin:api.refreshSuccess: List of API keys has been refreshed.
admin:api.revokeSuccess: The key has been revoked successfully.
admin:api.newKeyGuestGroupError: The guests group cannot be used for API keys.
